sentences.pinyin: zhè gè bù liào hěn cū.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他感觉这种粗糙的地毯和房间的简约风格相冲突。
sentences.traditionalText: 他感覺這種粗糙的地毯和房間的簡約風格相衝突。
sentences.pinyin: tā gǎn jué zhè zhǒng cū cāo de dì tǎn hé fáng jiān de jiǎn yuē fēng gé xiāng chōng tū.
sentences.translation: He feels that this coarse carpet clashes with the minimalist style of the room.

sentences.simplifiedText: 她不喜欢用粗的铅笔画画，因为她认为细的铅笔更适合细节。
sentences.traditionalText: 她不喜歡用粗的鉛筆畫畫，因為她認為細的鉛筆更適合細節。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bù xǐhuān yòng cū de qiānbǐ huà huà, yīnwèi tā rènwéi xì de qiānbǐ gèng shìhé xìjié.
sentences.translation: She doesn't like to draw with thick pencils because she thinks finer pencils are better for details.

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然他的言语粗鲁，但他的动作非常体贴，让我觉得很舒服。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然他的言語粗魯，但他的動作非常體貼，讓我覺得很舒服。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán tā de yányǔ cūlǔ, dàn tā de dòngzuò fēicháng tǐtiē, ràng wǒ juédé hěn shūfú.
sentences.translation: Although his words are vulgar, his actions are very considerate, making me feel comfortable.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他糙率的态度在这个精细的工作中显得格外粗
sentences.traditionalText: 他糙率的態度在這個精細的工作中顯得格外粗
sentences.pinyin: Tā cāolǜ de tàidù zài zhège jīngxì de gōngzuò zhōng xiǎndé géwài cū
sentences.translation: His rough and ready attitude stands out as exceptionally crude in this kind of delicate work
